aws_services: VPC, IAM, S3, KMS, CloudTrail, EC2, Auto Scaling, ALB, CloudWatch, NAT Gateway, Internet Gateway, Security Groups, VPC Endpoints
background: Multi-region secure AWS infrastructure deployment using Terraform with comprehensive security controls. Implements AWS Well-Architected Framework principles across us-west-1 and us-east-1 regions. Features include KMS encryption with automatic key rotation, IAM security with MFA enforcement and least privilege policies, multi-AZ high availability with auto scaling, CloudTrail auditing with multi-region coverage, VPC networking with public/private subnet isolation, Application Load Balancers with TLS 1.2+ enforcement, S3 buckets with encryption and VPC endpoint restrictions, IMDSv2 enforcement for EC2 instances, and CloudWatch logging with KMS encryption. The solution includes 193 comprehensive tests (113 unit + 80 integration) with 100% pass rate and zero mocking, validating security best practices, compliance requirements, and infrastructure reliability.
author: koushik-turing
